cause.description:
Geese are a major problem in cities, suburbs, and rural towns. they are the number one cause of getting carp on our shoes and are dangerous to the people living aroun an area of large geese population. geese are also killing ducklings. no joke. in observation by a local school they fond that when geeselings and duck lings are in the same enivorment the geese would kill the ducks to lessen the compitition. the geese need to be stoped and our experts have found the solution. ravonous bears! these bears are train to love the taste of geese meat and are extremely fast and will sneek upon the geese and rip them to shreds before the have a chance to shit themselves.
1. Geese must be elimanated.
cause.mission: make the geese population in the u.s. to decrease by half.
cause.name: kill the geese
